tool.name: Normalize.shared
tool.description: Normalize the number of sequences per group to a specified level

param.name: otu
param.label: shared,relabund - OTU Shared or Relabund file

param.name: makerelabund
param.label: makerelabund - convert a shared file to a relabund file before you normalize

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documentation**
The normalize.shared_ command normalizes the number of sequences per group to a specified level. The input is a shared_ or relabund_ file.
.. _shared: https://www.mothur.org/wiki/Shared_file .. _relabund: https://www.mothur.org/wiki/Get.relabund .. _normalize.shared: https://www.mothur.org/wiki/Normalize.shared
